data.text:
Please would you provide a spreadsheet with all current verified MBOD data using the following fields for the report?

Type of Document (BME/COFE)
Metrofile Number
Bureau Number 1
Bureau Number 2
Bureau Number 3
Industry Number
Surname
Name 1
Name 2
Name 3
ID Number
Date of Birth
Last Recorded Age
Passport Number
Citizenship
Address 1
Address 2
Address 3
City / Town
Province
Country
Postal Code
Date of Benefit Medical Examination
Centre Performing Medical Examination
Deceased
Status
Date of Last Risk Shift
Certification
Reason for Deferment
Diagnosis
Date of Certification
Date First Employed
Date Last Employed
Last Employer
Last Occupation

If any field doesnâ€™t have a value, it must be extracted as Not Available. Dates without a value must be 01/01/1900 00:00:00.
